SEARCH
Package cz.cvut.fel.omo.semestral.entity.devices

Interface IDeviceObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller, FridgeController, GateController, LightController, SecurityController, TemperatureController, TVController
public interface IDeviceObserver
Interface for implementing observer functionality in device systems. This interface allows objects to be notified of changes in device states.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    update(IDevice device)
    Updates the observer based on a change in the observed device's state.

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(IDevice device)
      Updates the observer based on a change in the observed device's state.
      Parameters:
      device - The device that has undergone a change and is notifying its observers.
